title: Does a Photograph Show Planned Parenthood’s Founder at a KKK Rally?
subtitle: Margaret Sanger once addressed female KKK members in a bid to have her message heard as widely as possible, but she disparaged the group's mission.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A photograph documents Planned Parenthood founder Margaret Sanger speaking to women of the Ku Klux Klan (KKK).
